typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EMPNO as string,
		ENAME as string,
		JOB as string,
		MGR as string,
		HIREDATE as string,
		SAL as string,
		COMM as string,
		DEPTNO as string,
		modified_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ABLB
ABLB sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		EMPNO,
		ENAME,
		JOB,
		MGR,
		HIREDATE,
		SAL,
		COMM,
		DEPTNO,
		modified_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_container: 'errorlogs',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: false) ~> SQLEmployee
